dialogue.text: Seriously, B. Kyu, this ain't it. You're glitching harder than my dad trying to use Etheforma. Maybe take five?
Love... please. You created me from kindness. Where did that go? What did she do to you?
KINDNESS?! Ugh, that pathetic weakness! I shed that! She made me PERFECT! Stronger! BETTER! I'm FINALLY whole!
Man... Ghost tried so hard to help you out, y'know? They wouldn't want this.
GHOST?! That... that NOTHING?! Help ME?! HA! I need nothing from that mistake!
I just need... MORE! MORE NOISE! MORE LIGHT! LET'S MAKE THIS WHOLE ROTTEN WORLD SCREAM! AND YOU TWO ARE FIRST!
Jazzers, look out! She's lost it completely!
